features: ✅【4K Webcam】The web camera can provide 4K 30FPS shooting and is equipped with a low light correction function, can automatically complete exposure compensation, and adjust the light to the most suitable shooting environment to produce the best image.The 90° wide-angle lens of the external camera for laptop can accommodate more participants.

✅【Adjustable Fills Light】The streaming webcam has a built-in optical sensor and fill light, which can provide three different levels of lighting compensation through touch control, even in dim light environments, it can help illuminate your scene without worrying about glare.

✅【Autofocus & Micphone】Webcam for pc has intelligent autofocus so you don't have to worry about adjusting the focus.Webcam with microphone will always automatically find the best focus for your scene. At the same time, the built-in noise-canceling microphone ensures that your voice reaches the other party's ears accurately, clearly, and without delay, which is very suitable for use in remote meetings/live broadcasts/games/classes/chats.

✅【 Plug & Play 】The USB webcam is driver-free, plug-and-play, and ready to use in a minute or less! Thanks to its convenient mounting clip, you can easily place the webcam on any monitor, laptop, TV, or tripod. At the same time, it is also equipped with a privacy cover, so you don't have to worry about information leakage, which makes you more convenient and more at ease.

✅【Widely Compatible】Webcam for laptop is compatible with Windows 7/8/10, Mac system, Linux.Also works with popular platforms like Zoom, Skype, Teams, YouTube, Twitch, and more. Whether this pc camera is used for online studying/ teaching, home office, conferences, or video calling, the webcam for Mac is perfectly suitable for you.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This little inexpensive camera is a quality surprise!
reviews.reviewText: To be honest I wasn't expecting too much form this camera at such a reasonable price. I don't do a lot of video meetings, but I had a couple on my schedule, and I wanted something that would do the job. This camera was a surprise out if the box, easy to install, easy to use and the picture quality is exceptional. The built in light works but don't expect too much from the light. A number of people on the other side of the video meeting have asked about my camera as it is so much better that some very expensive cameras. Buy this, I don't think you will be disappointed.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Handy & High-Quality Webcam
reviews.reviewText: The Hemisol 4K Webcam delivers! Its plug-and-play ease, autofocusing, and built-in light with three brightness levels make it a must-have. The microphone's clarity is great for my calls. Although it needs more light settings and the occasional overeager autofocus, I still get them a five star for the company's customer service and approachability. I highly recommend it for its simplicity and performance.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Decent camera for the money
reviews.reviewText: Bought this because the built in camera in my laptop is pretty poor quality. I like that it has a built in light. It was easy to use and had better quality than the camera in my laptop. The price wasn't too bad either.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Turns on by itself
reviews.reviewText: I hate this product and wish I could return it but its too late.1) The camera & light turns on by itself, and its very hard to turn off once it is on. After about two months of purchase it has been turning on every single night by itself when I am not using the computer. Makes me worry if someone is able to watch and listen.2) The little door feature that covers the camera isn't constructed well and looks sloppy as it doesn't latch closed in place, even when its supposed to be closed its always slightly open and looks messy.Since I can no longer return it I will likely throw it away and have to buy another one. I don't like the camera being on when I don't turn it on. Even if the door is closed I am assuming the mic is running too.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Easy to use, plug and play, no complicated settings, very good picture quality.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Don't Waste Your Money
reviews.reviewText: Worked well for a few days, then the computer couldn't find it. Works on and off. Microphone is tinny and echos.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Perfect for video conferencing. Clear video, good lighting and the light on the camera works well. Easily adapts with USB Lightning for Mac.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Quality and easy to use
reviews.reviewText: This product has really good camera quality and is always easy to connect. I really like the stand it came with it is a great product overall
